sentences.sentence: You will play decoy whilst I beg.
Marketing professors call it the decoy effect, which is certainly easier to remember.
sentences.translation: 营销学教授称之为诱饵效应，这名字肯定更容易记。

sentences.sentence: The decoy effect works because of the way our brains assign value when making choices.
sentences.translation: 诱饵效应起作用是因为我们大脑在做选择时会确定选择的价值。
